meanings.definition: A person or thing that makes something again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The toy remaker fixed my broken doll.
meanings.sent2: The remaker of the painting added new colors to the artwork.
meanings.sent3: The cake remaker turned a burnt cake into a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent4: She was a true remaker of old furniture, turning trash into treasure.
meanings.sent5: The remaker of memories recreated the past in a beautiful way.

meanings.definition: To make something again or differently.
meanings.sent1: I will remaker this dress to fit me better.
meanings.sent2: He decided to remaker the recipe by adding more spices.
meanings.sent3: The magician remakered the card trick to surprise the audience.
meanings.sent4: She had to remaker the speech after forgetting her lines.
meanings.sent5: The artist remakered the sculpture to give it a modern twist.
